trans-unit.source: Provides methods and attached properties that support data validation.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos e propriedades anexadas que dão suporte à validação de dados.

trans-unit.source: For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see "Data Validation" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma discussão detalhada sobre o processo de validação, consulte "Validação de dados" em [visão geral de associação de dados](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> object to add <c>handler</c> to.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> ao qual o <c>manipulador</c> será adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The handler to add.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Adds an event handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error" /> attached event to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um manipulador de eventos do evento anexado <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error" /> ao objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The object to turn valid.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser transformado em válido.

trans-unit.source: Removes all <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError" /> objects from the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError" /> do objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The `bindingExpression` object may have been invalid from a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.MarkInvalid%2A> call or a previously failed validation.
trans-unit.target: O `bindingExpression` objeto pode ter sido inválido de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.MarkInvalid%2A> chamada ou uma validação falhou anteriormente.

trans-unit.source: The object is valid after this call.
trans-unit.target: O objeto é válido após esta chamada.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="bindingExpression" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="bindingExpression" /> for <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error" /> anexado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors" /> anexada.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate" /> anexada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> object to read the value from.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> do qual o valor é lido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors" /> attached property of the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da propriedade anexada <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors" /> do elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyObservableCollection`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyObservableCollection`1" /> de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError" />.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="element" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="element" /> for <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> object to read the value from.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> do qual o valor é lido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate" /> attached property of the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da propriedade anexada <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate" /> do elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate" /> used to generate validation error feedback on the adorner layer.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate" /> usado para gerar comentários de erro de validação na camada de adorno.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="element" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="element" /> for <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> object to read the value from.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> do qual o valor é lido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError" /> attached property of the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da propriedade anexada <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError" /> do elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError" /> attached property of the specified element.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade anexada <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError" /> do elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="element" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="element" /> for <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The element from which to get the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite" />.
trans-unit.target: O elemento do qual o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite" /> deve ser obtido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite" /> attached property for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da propriedade anexada <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite" /> para o elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite" />.

trans-unit.source: The element from which to get the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor" />.
trans-unit.target: O elemento do qual o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor" /> deve ser obtido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor" /> attached property for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da propriedade anexada <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor" /> para o elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor" />.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError" /> anexada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> object to mark as invalid.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> a ser marcado como inválido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError" /> object to use.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError" /> a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: Marks the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> object as invalid with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Marca o objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> especificado como inválido com o objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> object stays invalid until <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ClearInvalid%2A> is called or another transfer to the binding source validates successfully.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> objeto permanece inválido até <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ClearInvalid%2A> é chamado ou outra transferência para a fonte da associação for validado com êxito.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="validationError" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="validationError" /> for <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> object to remove <c>handler</c> from.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> do qual o <c>manipulador</c> deve ser removido.

trans-unit.source: The handler to remove.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Adds an event handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error" /> attached event from the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um manipulador de eventos do evento anexado <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error" /> do objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> object to set <c>value</c> on.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> no qual o <c>valor</c> será definido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate" /> to use to generate validation error feedback on the adorner layer.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate" /> a ser usado para gerar comentários de erro de validação na camada de adorno.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate" /> attached property to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor da propriedade anexada <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate" /> para o elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="element" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="element" /> for <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The element on which to set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite" />.
trans-unit.target: O elemento no qual o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite" /> deve ser definido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite" /> of the specified element.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite" /> do elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite" /> attached property to the specified value on the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Define a propriedade anexada <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite" /> para o valor especificado no elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The element on which to set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor" />.
trans-unit.target: O elemento no qual o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor" /> deve ser definido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor" /> of the specified element.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor" /> do elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor" /> attached property to the specified value on the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Define a propriedade anexada <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor" /> para o valor especificado no elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor" /> anexada.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite" /> anexada.
